details: Acts prominently within the domain of the pneumogastric. Eructations, nausea, salivation, pressure on stomach. Jaundice, splenic and hepatic hypertrophy. Enteric symptoms and GREAT DROWSINESS very marked. Cardiac FAINTING. Enuresis. Rectal symptoms. Tongue rough, dry; throat constricted. Coldness. Confusion in head. Irresistible sleepiness. Symptoms worse walking in open air.
name: Linaria
